str2: Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Only, solitary, desolate. Probably from meno; remaining, i.e. Sole or single; by implication, mere.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
